entry.title: Making money playing games? Sounds awesome! 🤩 But does it work? 🤔
entry.summary:
Making money playing games? Sounds awesome! 🤩 But does it work? 🤔
Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Leveling up with Blockchain Gaming 🔹🔷 Blockchain gaming has transformed gamers into earners💰 Imagine a gaming universe where players own their in-game assets, transparency and security are non-negotiable, and the gaming experience is better than traditional platforms. 🧵

entry.title: What do blockchains add to gaming?
entry.summary:
What do blockchains add to gaming?
🆅🅸🅺🆃🅷🅾🆁: #30daysoftext Day 7 𝗕𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝗚𝗮𝗺𝗶𝗻𝗴 Blockchain Gaming is the Integration of web2 games into the blockchain which enables new gameplay mechanics, enables ownership of in-game assets, and creates a more decentralized gaming ecosystem.

entry.title: Do you think web3 gaming is the future? 🤔
entry.summary:
Do you think web3 gaming is the future? 🤔
Patrick Skinner (🧱, 🚀): #30daysoftext @developer_dao 🎮 The landscape of #Web3 gaming is evolving! We need to completely do away with the 'Play-to-Earn' approach. Let's dive into why the industry is shifting towards a 'Play AND Earn' model. 🌐🕹️ 🧵 (1/9)
